inclusion.criterion: willing and able to comply with protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age over 18 and under 65 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recently diagnosed with symptomatic Multiple Myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: laboratory values within 14 days before Baseline visit
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previously received treatment for Multiple Myeloma
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: had major surgery within 4 weeks before enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: platelet count < 50x 109/L within 14 days before enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: absolute neutrophil count < 1.0 x 109/L within 14 days before enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity to bortezomib, boron or mannitol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: received other investigational drugs within 14 days before enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known to be seropositive for the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and has been treated with various medications, including melphalan, prednisone, VAD regimen, and thalidomide.
